name: Cute Girl Is Cold
description:
A short game made using GDevelop for the Lame Jam Game Jam.

Use your mouse cursor to direct the fire ball and warm up the cute girl.

Known issues:
Clouds tend to jiggle for a bit before settling down.

The cute girl sometimes gets stuck at the beginning of her death animation.  Dunno if it's my naivete with the game engine or an actual engine bug... assume the former.

Changelog:

3/12/23: original upload

3/12/23: fixed issue with muse cursor not appearing in good end.
Got rid of the annoying log in prompt in the main game UI.
